dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 50,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, categorized into 10 classes, used for evaluating the performance of convolutional neural networks.

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing about 1.2 million training images and 50,000 validation images across 1,000 classes, used for evaluating image classification models.
